languages.text: Доставленн{mf|ого|ую} на медпалубу Вольного Торговца моментально обступают врачи — столь плотно, что сервочереп тревожно кружит над ними, пытаясь отыскать цель своей записи. Наконец, Лорд-капитан открывает глаза, выдернут{mf|ый|ая} в сознание коктейлем лекарств и биостимуляторов из нескольких капельниц.

traits.locale_text: Доставленн{mf|ого|ую} на медпалубу Вольного Торговца моментально обступают врачи — столь плотно, что сервочереп тревожно кружит над ними, пытаясь отыскать цель своей записи. Наконец, Лорд-капитан открывает глаза, выдернут{mf|ый|ая} в сознание коктейлем лекарств и биостимуляторов из нескольких капельниц.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.
languages.original_text: Доставленн{mf|ого|ую} на медпалубу Вольного Торговца моментально обступают врачи — столь плотно, что сервочереп тревожно кружит над ними, пытаясь отыскать цель своей записи. Наконец, Лорд-капитан открывает глаза, выдернут{mf|ый|ая} в сознание коктейлем лекарств и биостимуляторов из нескольких капельниц.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader, who has been taken to the medicae deck, is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull is anxiously circling above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the focus of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulators from several IV bags.

The Rogue Trader, who has been taken to the medicae deck, is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull is anxiously circling above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the focus of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulators from several IV bags.

At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulators from several IV bags.

At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulators from several IV bags.

The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

languages.text: Llevan a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a la cubierta médica y al momento {mf|le|la} rodean los médicos. Hay tanta gente que el servocráneo tiene que revolotear por encima, intentando vislumbrar el objetivo de su grabación. Por fin, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán abre los ojos, gracias a una combinación de medicación y bioestimulantes intravenosos que le devuelven la consciencia.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

traits.locale_text: Llevan a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a la cubierta médica y al momento {mf|le|la} rodean los médicos. Hay tanta gente que el servocráneo tiene que revolotear por encima, intentando vislumbrar el objetivo de su grabación. Por fin, {mf|el|la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} abre los ojos, gracias a una combinación de medicación y bioestimulantes intravenosos que le devuelven la consciencia.

languages.text: 行商浪人被带到了医疗甲板，随即立刻被医护人员包围。{mf|他|她}身边的医护人员实在是太多了，伺服头骨焦急地在人群上方盘旋着，试图找个角度窥见正在记录的对象。医护人员打开了几个静脉注射袋，为{mf|他|她}注射了各种各样的药物与生物刺激物质，最终总算是让{mf|他|她}睁开了眼睛。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人被带到了医疗甲板，随即立刻被医护人员包围。{mf|他|她}身边的医护人员实在是太多了，伺服头骨焦急地在人群上方盘旋着，试图找个角度窥见正在记录的对象。医护人员打开了几个静脉注射袋，为{mf|他|她}注射了各种各样的药物与生物刺激物质，最终总算是让{mf|他|她}睁开了眼睛。

languages.text: 自由開拓者はメディケアデッキに連れて行かれて、そこであっという間に医師達に囲まれてしまった。人間があまりに密集しているため、サーヴォスカルは心配そうにその頭上を旋回し、記録対象を一目見ようとしている。点滴バッグに入った薬剤と生体刺激物質の混合物のおかげで意識を取り戻し、やっとロード・キャプテンは目を開いた。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者はメディケアデッキに連れて行かれて、そこであっという間に医師達に囲まれてしまった。人間があまりに密集しているため、サーヴォスカルは心配そうにその頭上を旋回し、記録対象を一目見ようとしている。点滴バッグに入った薬剤と生体刺激物質の混合物のおかげで意識を取り戻し、やっとロード・キャプテンは目を開いた。

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} wird auf das Medizindeck gebracht und sofort von Ärzten umringt – die Menge ist so dicht, dass der Servoschädel ängstlich über ihnen kreist und versucht, einen Blick auf das Objekt seiner Aufzeichnung zu erhaschen. Schließlich öffnet der Lord Captain die Augen und wird mittels eines Cocktails aus Medikamenten und Biostimulanzien aus mehreren Infusionsbeuteln wieder zu Bewusstsein gebracht.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

languages.text: On emmène {name} au pont de la medicae, où une véritable foule de médecins se précipite à son chevet. Ils sont si nombreux que le servocrâne les survole nerveusement pour tenter d'apercevoir le sujet de son enregistrement. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} finit par reprendre connaissance grâce à un cocktail de médicaments et de biostimulants administrés par plusieurs perfusions.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

traits.locale_text: On emmène {name} au pont de la medicae, où une véritable foule de médecins se précipite à son chevet. Ils sont si nombreux que le servocrâne les survole nerveusement pour tenter d'apercevoir le sujet de sa pictocapture. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} finit par reprendre connaissance grâce à un cocktail de médicaments et de biostimulateurs administrés par plusieurs perfusions.

languages.text: Hür Tacir sıhhiye güvertesine götürülüyor ve etrafı anında doktorlarla sarılıyor. Kalabalık o kadar yoğun ki hizmelet, endişeyle üstlerinde dönüp kayıt öznesini bir anlığına da olsa görmeye çalışıyor. Lord Kaptan, birkaç serum torbasından bir araya getirilen ilaç ve biyo uyarıcı karışımı sayesinde sonunda gözlerini açarak kendine geliyor.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader is taken to the medicae deck, where {mf|he|she} is instantly surrounded by doctors — the crowd is so dense that the servo-skull anxiously circles above them, trying to catch a glimpse of the subject of its recording. At last, the Lord Captain opens {mf|his|her} eyes, dragged back to consciousness by a cocktail of medications and biostimulants from several IV bags.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir sıhhiye güvertesine götürülüyor ve etrafı anında doktorlarla sarılıyor. Kalabalık o kadar yoğun ki hizmelet endişeyle üstlerinde dönüp kayıt öznesini bir anlığına da olsa görmeye çalışıyor. Lord Kaptan, birkaç serum torbasından bir araya getirilen ilaç ve biyo uyarıcı karışımı sayesinde sonunda gözlerini açarak kendine geliyor.
